metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8611 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Openstack Glance. No limits are enforced within the Glance image service for both v1 and v2 `/images` API POST method for authenticated users, resulting in possible denial of service attacks through database table saturation.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> There may never be a fix for this issue. mdeslaur> See upstream advisory for recommendations

criterions.comment: glance: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
